title: Success Ratio
details: Excelling at work requires hands-on experience. Our practical, project-based approach equips students with real-world skills, giving them an edge in the global job market. 87% of our students achieve their professional or freelance goals after completing their courses.

title: Works at Expert Freelancer
details: Over 17,000 of our students have successfully built their freelancing careers on platforms like Fiverr, Upwork, and Freelancer.com. Many begin earning before course completion, turning skills into sustainable income from home.

title: Average Rating
details: Our courses are consistently rated 4.9 out of 5 by thousands of learners. This high rating reflects the effectiveness of our content, instructor quality, and the success students experience through our programs.

title: Total Trainers
details: We have a team of 13 dedicated expert trainers, each specialized in different fields like digital marketing, web development, graphic design, and cybersecurity. Their guidance ensures each student gets personalized support and up-to-date industry knowledge.
